idea-plugin.name: PyCharm Refactoring Bridge
idea-plugin.description:
Exposes PyCharm's refactoring capabilities via an HTTP API for integration with external tools like Claude Code MCP.

Features

  • Rename symbols across the entire project
  • Move elements between modules
  • Extract methods and variables
  • Inline elements
  • Change function signatures
  • Safe delete with usage checking
  • Find usages

Usage

The plugin starts an HTTP server on port 9876 (configurable) when PyCharm launches. Use the companion MCP server to connect Claude Code to PyCharm's refactoring engine.
